segments.text: I've never seen a machine like this before and need some help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , no problem . What are you trying to get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy a drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . This machine needs you to use that change machine first to get correct change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got the correct change already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First you put your money in the dollar slot or the coin slot . The dollars have to be smooth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just know that sometimes the money doesn't go in perfectly the first time and you have to try again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Choose what you want and push the button . Sometimes it takes a couple of tries .
segments.speaker: S2
